char_info.desc: The Maiden Who Converts Determination to Strength

a0.speaker: Emiri:
a0.dialogue: Rats. I cannot believe that you are that strong to defeat such a skilled fighter like me!

a1.speaker: Reimu:
a1.dialogue: Well, all pagans like you are just like twerps that I can use as punching bags. So long, fish-eating loser!
